Portland.Memorial Stadium (Maine):
Memorial Stadium is a 5,200 seat multi-purpose outdoor stadium in Portland, Maine, USA. Located behind Deering High School in the Deering Center neighborhood, it uses FieldTurf.
In addition to hosting Deering High School sports it is the home stadium of the Portland Phoenix FC, an amateur team in the USL Premier Development League. It's also the home field for the Southern Maine Raging Bulls of the semi-professional New England Football League.
